abstrac: We are a software services and a digital marketing company!
bio:
We are a web & mobile apps development agency. Just started in 2014, we are attracting some massive projects with our agile-distinctive style of working and exemplary team of developers.

# Advance Web Development #

You want,

- A complete Website
- A clone of Website
- A Web Application- CRM, Web Portal

Services
        - Website Customization/Optimization
        - Code Clean-up
        - SEO/SMO
        - API/Social Media Integration

$ E-Commerce $

- If you are thinking about targeting one of the highest grossing industry of 2014, Our team consisting of Experts of B2B industry and Programmers are here to help. Together they evaluate your Business requirements perfectly into technical requirements and eventually a successful E-Commerce Brand.

Too Technical? Don't worry!

- JUST SHARE YOUR IDEA WITH US & LEAVE EVERYTHING TO OUR PROFICIENT TEAM.

What we offer in Web Development Domain:

- Python, Django, Flask, TastyPie, PHP, WordPress, REST 
- Amazon AWS, Stripe/PayPal, eBay, Terapeak API integration
- Facebook, Twitter, Google+ & other Social Media Integration

# Web Designing #

You want,

- Website mock-ups
- Theme Designing
- Logo Designing
- Graphics Designing

What we offer:
- HTML5, CSS3, Jquery, JavaScript, Twitter Bootstrap, 

# Cloud Application Development #

- Are you a small Business with limited Capital to invest?
CLOUD COMPUTING COMES AS BLESSING FOR YOU.

- Change your CAPEX to OPEX
- Pay only for the amount you used and that too in Postpaid.
- Vast array of benefits of your choice of Cloud Service Provider.
- No need for Maintenance team
- Save Time and Money

What we offer:
- Enterprise level complete SaaS Solutions

# Mobile Application Development #
-Android
-iOS
    - iPhone
    - iPad
-Cross Platform

Get in Touch-

Mail- sunny@python-development.com
Skype- pythondevelopment

Looking forward to hearing from you.

We as a company have 20+ years of experience and work on quick agile development and following are our terms and conditions:

1) We make weekly deliverables of our projects milestones and expect a weekly milestone payment release in return.
2) We communicate frequently and onsite charges are to be incurred by employer if an employee has to visit onsite.
3) A clear discussion of weekly deliverables is to be done prior to starting the project.

description.title: CTE Design
description: CTE was started in 1985 as an Auto Glass co. and then added a design component in 1995 after training at Sierra College with AutoCAD. The glass co. was shut down due to a bad economy and pushed the de…

bio: CTE was started in 1985 as an Auto Glass co. and then added a design component in 1995 after training at Sierra College with AutoCAD. The glass co. was shut down due to a bad economy and pushed the design aspects of the company to the forefront and started working with architects and builders. AutoCAD was the perfect fit given the ease of document control and production and we have never looked back. Currently we teach AutoCAD and pull permits for manufactured homes as well as some architectural and mechanical design.
Mon-Sat 8-5

abstrac: Providing a First Class Service Everytime
bio: I am a conscientious and self motivated project manager  and administrator with over 16 years of experience in the publishing and production industry. In addition to this, I have social media and Internet marketing experience also.  I pride myself in having a technical mind and being a fast learner. I am organized and results-oriented and familiar with working with customers and colleagues overseas. Project Management:I can handle your project management needs from start to finish. I am adept at decision making, devising strategies, account management, problem solving, prioritising work, creating efficient systems, organising / co-ordinating work, multi-tasking & forward planning, working to deadlines, scheduling and liaising with clients and suppliers.Social Media and Internet Marketing:I specialise in marketing businesses and products using Facebook and Twitter. But I am also familiar with marketing with You Tube, Pinterest and Google Plus. My Internet marketing experience includ

Payments:My preference would be to be paid by SafePay Escrow and have the funds deposited by Safe Pay account before work begins. I would also request a Project Award should my application be successful.For online marketing / traffic generation related work.  I will require half the fee before work begins and the balance to be placed in safe pay Escrow.  The balance is then to be released to me upon completion of the work.Depending upon the duration of the project, I would consider alternative arrangements to be agreed before the project begins.
